title: Job Applicant Interview
Interview Descriptions: It was good for the most part, some people very scrutinous on the technicals outside of the case. It was about what you would expect, very similar to the types of interviews you get from the other companies. Overall just be prepared for the typical interview process.
Interview Questions: What’s something you follow in the healthcare space?

title: Analyst Interview
Interview Descriptions: Heard from the team only two days after submitting my application. First interview was only behavioral. Second interview was a case. Very friendly and encouraging staff. I am excited to hear back from the firm.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in healthcare consulting?

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Clearview (Boston, MA) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions:
1st round:  45min behavior+case (life science, estimate peak sales of a drug)
2nd round: 4 back-to-back, 45min interview, behavior+case (covering cutting edge life sciences area including CART,  cancer immunology, in vivo anti-virus....)

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Clearview (Boston, MA) in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was behavioral/case fit interview. Applied through campus interview program. Notified that i got the interview. Was asked to review resume and solve a case problem. They were really nice but was not used to the consulting case interviwe.
Interview Questions: As me to go over my resume with them.

title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Clearview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was not too stressful. Pretty typical of consulting, they asked why you want to do consulting, why healthcare in particular, and the case is more specific to health care.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Clearview (Monroe, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Interview with nurse manager and two other nurses from the unit. Very friendly people and easy to interview with. Everyone had been there over 8 years which was good to me.  It showed that the nurses found longevity. They seemed welcoming to new grads, because that's what I am.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

title: Customer Success Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Clearview (Roy, UT) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very unprofessional, not very many questions, mostly just wanted to see what I looked like I guess. Hired same day and began training the next. Not much else to say besides it was a quick and short experience.
